Title: Ketsuekigata-kun!
Description: ['Are all A Types kind yet indecisive? Does being a B Type imply the opposite? Are O Types more passionate and childish than others? How would one even get along with AB Types? ', Ketsuekigata-kun!, ' explores Japanese and Korean cultural stereotypes associated with blood types in romantic and leisurely situations.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]']
